headline: From AMP to Signed Exchanges, Or How Innovation Happens at Cloudflare
keywords: Speed Week, Signed Exchanges (SXG), Product News, Speed & Reliability, Cloudflare History
description: This is the story of how we decided to work with Google to build Signed Exchanges support at Cloudflare. But, more generally, it's also a story of how Cloudflare thinks about building disruptive new products.
